Comparison 'no scalp block ' Outcome surgical plethysmographic index ( SPI ) responses during/after Mayfield head holder insertion Sample size include 30 case ( 15 case per arm ) The eligible neurosurgical patient randomly allocate , concealed randomization process , receive receive scalp block induction intubation propofol/fentanyl cisatracurium . Surgical plethysmographic index , direct arterial blood pressure , heart rate ( EEG ) , End tidal Carbondioxide , Bispectral/entropy ( 40-60 ) record every one minute before/after induction intubation , before/after scalp block , before/after Mayfield head-holder insertion . The Mayfield head-holder insertion perform neurosurgeon blind allocate group . Data analysis perform compare change SPI Mayfield head-holder insertion baseline group use repeated measure ANOVA significant level 0.05 .
